entries.title: Performance, Risk, & QoS, Intern
entries.description: I spent my time acting as a data investigator. From validating field anomalies to analyzing churn metrics, I learned that precise data isn't just about reporting but the foundation of every strategic move a company makes

entries.title: Co-Founder, Finance Director
entries.description: I work in a fast-moving environment where decisions carry direct consequences. Building the venture has taught me how financial structure, governance, and disciplined judgment turn ideas into systems that sustain growth over time.

entries.title: Equity Research Analyst, Intern
entries.description: I had the opportunity to dive into financials and market signals of IDX-listed firms, I uncovered patterns, valued stocks with DCF and comps, and crafted research that empowered management to act decisively in fast-moving market conditions.

entries.title: Business Development, Intern
entries.description: My days were filled with reaching out, digging into industries, and keeping things organized. Between prospecting and research, I learned how to spot opportunities and keep the momentum going.

entries.title: Static Event, Head of Business Plan Presentation
entries.description: While engineers built the car, I built the story behind it—researching markets, modeling finances, and shaping a business plan that made our race car more than fast, but also financially and strategically driven.

entries.title: Finance and Administration
entries.description: My first professional step was managing finances at BEM FEB—handling budgets, ensuring accurate reports, and streamlining cash flow, all while learning to balance responsibility with practical teamwork in a dynamic student organization.
